Name: Amalia
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Sip a gooseberry and mint influenced lemon Daiquiri though a foam topping.
History: Created in 2008 by Sam Dean, Mobar,  Nottingham England.
Nutrition: One serving of Amalia contains 176 calories
